I see KSP YouTubers rotate the camera, not around the focused object, but around the camera itself. I assume it is a button you hold while rotating the camera. What is it?

Edited October 13, 2014 by RedsBone
Answered :)
It's a mod for cinematic cameras. Somebody will be along shortly to explain which one, I believe it was featured on Modding Mondays a while back but I don't use many mods so I don't know the name.
